snippet.title: Defina Daily Gameplay ⚔️
snippet.description:
Hello Definians, in this video we demonstrate some everyday gameplay on what you can expect when joining our community. We look forward to having you join us 😊.

About Us 💓:
Defina Finance is a fascinating blockchain game that combines the concept of DeFi and NFT. Players can buy or collect various NFT Mystery Boxes to get heroes & weapons as well as fight and enhance their champions to learn skills in numerous game scenarios. Players can participate in DeFi yield farming and earn abundant on-chain earnings while enjoying a fun and strategic game with PVP and PVE modes. 

Defina’s vision is to bring blockchain to millions of players, allowing them to explore a new form of gaming through blockchain technology. Come create-to-earn with us as we build the Defina metaverse together!

Define your destiny, conquer your enemy & earn FINA daily!

Follow Us Here:
▶️Website：https://defina.finance/
▶️Twitter：https://twitter.com/DefinaFinance
▶️Twitch：https://www.twitch.tv/defina_official
▶️Medium：https://defina-finance.medium.com/ 
▶️Discord：https://discord.com/invite/defina
▶️Telegram：https://t.me/definafinance1
